newsitem.title: USA: LPC-Banks line up $6 bln-$8 bln for US West.
newsitem.headline: LPC-Banks line up $6 bln-$8 bln for US West.

text.p: NEW YORK, August 21 (LPC) - Bank of New York Corp, Citcorp's Citibank and J.P. Morgan & Co Inc soon will syndicate a loan for U S West Communications Group of between $6 billion and $8 billion, bankers said.
The banks are planning to launch the deal in the second week of September to help finance U S West's $5.3 billion acquisition of Continental Cablevision, market sources said.
Terms of the bank loan have not yet been finalized, lenders said.
US West in February announced plans to buy Continental in a $10.8 billion transaction, including the assumption of more than $5 billion of Continental debt.
